languages.text: Население Даргонуса растет, старые порядки пора реформировать. Новую элиту составят самые решительные банды подульев. Дозволив им делить территорию в сражениях, Вольный Торговец отберет самых жестоких слуг.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.
languages.original_text: Население Даргонуса растет, старые порядки пора реформировать. Новую элиту составят самые решительные банды подульев. Дозволив им делить территорию в сражениях, Вольный Торговец отберет самых жестоких слуг.

traits.locale_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.
Tacit consent to the underhive's gang wars will nurture new generations of servants for the Rogue Trader — both warriors and aristocrats.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.
Tacit consent to the underhive's gang wars will nurture new generations of servants for the Rogue Trader — both warriors and aristocrats.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

languages.text: À mesure que la population de Dargonus croît, les anciennes traditions doivent être remises au goût du jour. Les gangs les plus audacieux de la sous-ruche formeront la nouvelle élite de la planète. En les laissant se battre pour le contrôle du territoire, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra sélectionner les plus vicieux d'entre eux pour devenir ses serviteurs.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

traits.locale_text: À mesure que la population de Dargonus croît, les anciennes traditions doivent être remises au goût du jour. Les gangs les plus audacieux de la sous-ruche formeront la nouvelle élite de la planète. En les laissant se battre pour le contrôle du territoire, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pourra sélectionner les plus vicieux d'entre eux pour devenir ses serviteurs.

languages.text: ダルゴナスの人口が増加するにつれ、古い習慣は改善しなければならない。極悪なアンダーハイヴのギャングたちは、この惑星の新たなエリート層になるだろう。彼らに領土争いをさせることで、ローグトレーダーは最も凶悪な下僕を選択することができる。
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスの人口が増加するにつれ、古い習慣は改善しなければならない。極悪なアンダーハイヴのギャングたちは、この惑星の新たなエリート層になるだろう。彼らに領土争いをさせることで、ローグトレーダーは最も凶悪な下僕を選択することができる。

languages.text: 达戈努斯的人口越来越多，以往的律法也必须进行改革。那些由亡命之徒组成的地下帮派，将会成为这颗行星新的精英阶层。只要不去插手他们之间的争斗，那些最为奸诈、最为恶毒的仆从就会为行商浪人所用。
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯的人口越来越多，以往的律法也必须进行改革。那些由亡命之徒组成的地下帮派，将会成为这颗行星新的精英阶层。只要不去插手他们之间的争斗，那些最为奸诈、最为恶毒的仆从就会为行商浪人所用。

languages.text: Conforme la población de Dargonus crece, es necesario mejorar las antiguas formas. Las bandas más audaces de los niveles inferiores formarán la nueva élite del planeta. Al permitirles luchar por el territorio, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se asegurará de poder reclutar a los más brutales.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

traits.locale_text: Conforme la población de Dargonus crece, es necesario mejorar las antiguas formas. Las bandas más audaces de los niveles inferiores formarán la nueva élite del planeta. Al permitirles luchar por el territorio, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se asegurará de poder reclutar a los más brutales.

languages.text: Die Bevölkerung von Dargonus wächst, die alten Prozesse müssen daher verbessert werden. Die verwegensten Gangs der Underhive werden die neue Elite des Planeten bilden. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sie einfach um Territorium kämpfen lässt, kann {mf|er|sie} sich anschließend die brutalsten Diener aussuchen.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.

traits.locale_text: Die Bevölkerung von Dargonus wächst, die alten Prozesse müssen daher verbessert werden. Die verwegensten Gangs der Underhive werden die neue Elite des Planeten bilden. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sie einfach um Territorium kämpfen lässt, kann {mf|er|sie} sich anschließend die brutalsten Diener aussuchen.

languages.text: Dargonus'un nüfusu arttıkça eski yöntemlerin de geliştirilmesi gerekiyor. Kovanaltı çetelerinin en yüreklileri, gezegenin yeni elit kesimini oluşturacak. Hür Tacir bunları kendi hâline bırakıp toprak için savaşmalarına izin vererek en azılı olanlarını hizmetkârlık için seçebilecek.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. The most audacious underhive gangs will form the planet's new elite. By leaving them to fight for territory, the Rogue Trader will be able to select the most vicious servants.
